description:
Rio terminal is a hardware-accelerated GPU terminal emulator, focusing to run in desktops and browsers.

Rio terminal is a hardware-accelerated GPU terminal emulator, focusing to run in desktops and browsers.
The supported platforms currently consist of BSD, Linux, MacOS and Windows.
